segments.text: How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I seem to have lost my train ticket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ’ s your destination ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m supposed to be going to shanghai .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . When is your train supposed to leave ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s supposed to leave in 30 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OH , dear . What ’ s your last name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: S M I T H .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And your passport number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see ... it doesn ’ t look like we have any information about your ticket here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything you can do for me ? If I don ’ t make it to shanghai in time , my wife is going go kill me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh dear . I ’ m really sorry , sir . But you don ’ t have any proof of purchase . You ’ ll simply have to purchase another ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much is that going to cost me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It depends on how you want to travel . If you want a soft sleeper , it will cost 610 RIB , if you want a hard seat , it will only cost 100RMB .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ’ t possibly travel on a hard seat for 10 hours !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: looks like you might like the soft sleeper then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , fine . Let me see how much money I have in my wallet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ... sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where ’ s my wallet ? Someone has stolen my wallet !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps it ’ s in your other pocket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re right . It is . Let me have a look . I have 419.6 RIB . is that enough ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re just 4 mao short for the hard sleeper , but I ’ ll let it go . Anything for love !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , ma ’ am . You ’ re a lifesaver !
segments.speaker: S2
